item.title: spirituality
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Sometimes you gotta take time to listen to your heart, because that shit is talking, and it would be kind of rude not to. #spirituality (10. Dez. 2019) People with long faces quite obviously live in an illusion. The illusion that something less than the heart is reality. And they feel stuck with it. But the heart never leaves. They always have the choice. #theorizing #hearttalk #spirituality (26. Nov. 2019)
